item.descr: Write "01" to start Sensor and Measurements, "00" to put to sleep
Period = [Input*10] ms, (lower limit 300 ms), default 1000 ms
Write "01" to select range 2G, "02" for 4G, "03" for 8G, "00" disable sensor
Write "01" to start measurements, "00" to stop
Period = [Input*10] ms, (lower limit 100 ms), default 1000 ms
Write "01" to start Sensor and Measurements, "00" to put to sleep
Write "01" to start Sensor and Measurements, "00" to put to sleep, "02" to read calibration values from sensor
When write "02" to Barometer conf. has been issued, the calibration values is found here.
Period = [Input*10] ms, (lower limit 100 ms), default 1000 ms
Write 0 to turn off gyroscope, 1 to enable X axis only, 2 to enable Y axis only, 3 = X and Y, 4 = Z only, 5 = X and Z, 6 = Y and Z, 7 = X, Y and Z
Self-test results (high bit indicates PASSED): Bit 0:IR temp, 1:Humidity, 2:Magnetometer, 3:accelerometer, 4:Barometer, 5:Gyroscope
bit 7: enable test mode; bit 0-1 LED bit mask
Write "01" to start Sensor and Measurements, "00" to put to sleep
Set bit 0 to enable input 0 etc. Write 0 to disable all inputs, 1F to enable all.
Threshold (raw unsigned 16-bit hex). Samples below this value are ignored.
bit 7: enable test mode; bit 0 controls LED
